name: Space Infestation (TorroneAfro)
description:
What is this?

a exercise project made to learn godot and gdscript, also pixel art and simple animation loop

Why play it?

just chilling, relax in silence with no sound (im to busy to implemwnt some 16bit noises). Take some live stream or history commentary in background.

What buttons i need to push for pew pew?

classic WASD combination or arrow keys for movement

Backspace or Enter button for shoot


escape-button or P for pause ( esc in full-screen mode is annoyng don't use it trust me)


Alt+F4 for cheats.


You can also use joypad
